attributes.title: Episode 1: The Dawn of Mogar
attributes.caption: Episode 1
attributes.description: Mogar, um... dawns! And with the help of intrepid reporter Ash, X-Ray and Vav are out to learn as much as they can about the secretive savage!
attributes.display_title: S2:E1 - Episode 1: The Dawn of Mogar

attributes.title: Episode 2: Enter the Dragonfic
attributes.caption: Episode 2
attributes.description: When Dragonface, X-Ray and Vav's biggest fan/stalker, gets his hands on an experimental invention of Hilda's, things get a little fan-fictional.

attributes.title: Episode 3: My Dinner With Ash
attributes.caption: X-Ray & Vav - Season 2
attributes.description: Vav has a dinner date with Ash, and he needs X-Ray's help to not screw it up. However, fate has other plans, and the three of them get caught in the middle of Mogar's mission.
attributes.display_title: S2:E3 - Episode 3: My Dinner With Ash

attributes.title: Episode 4: Coal & Order
attributes.caption: X-Ray and Vav solicit the aid of a grizzled private eye to help trace down Mogar
attributes.description: X-Ray and Vav solicit the aid of a grizzled private eye to help trace down Mogar.

attributes.title: Episode 5: The Madness of the King
attributes.caption: Our dynamic duo find themselves face to face with the Mad King, trying to interrogate him for information. However, the Mad King has plans of his own.
attributes.description: Our dynamic duo find themselves face to face with the Mad King, trying to interrogate him for information. However, the Mad King has plans of his own.
attributes.display_title: S2:E5 - Episode 5: The Madness of the King

attributes.title: Episode 6: It's a Crazy Mad World
attributes.caption: With his new partner in crime Mogar alongside him, The Mad King stages a coup to get back what was once his, while X-Ray and Vav stumble on to his plot.
attributes.description: With his new partner in crime Mogar alongside him, The Mad King stages a coup to get back what was once his, while X-Ray and Vav stumble on to his plot.
attributes.display_title: S2:E6 - Episode 6: It's a Crazy Mad World

attributes.title: Episode 7: The Anti-Vav Ray
attributes.caption: X-Ray and Vav try to stop the Mad King from getting an award, but the Mad King has his own plans.
attributes.description: X-Ray and Vav try to stop the Mad King from getting an award, but the Mad King has his own plans.

attributes.title: Episode 8: Divide & Conquer
attributes.caption: With X-Ray and Vav split up, it's up to Hilda and Rusty to step up to the plate. Meanwhile, Mogar becomes impatient for Mad King to hold up his end of the bargain.
attributes.description: With X-Ray and Vav split up, it's up to Hilda and Rusty to step up to the plate. Meanwhile, Mogar becomes impatient for Mad King to hold up his end of the bargain.

attributes.title: Episode 9: No You In Team
attributes.caption: The Mad King's plan moves forward; Ash tries to get X-Ray and Vav to put aside their differences so they can stop the Mad King.
attributes.description: The Mad King's plan moves forward; Ash tries to get X-Ray and Vav to put aside their differences so they can stop the Mad King.
attributes.display_title: S2:E9 - Episode 9: No You In Team

attributes.title: Episode 10: Reign Down
attributes.caption: X-Ray and Vav must stop the Mad King's plan, save Mogar, and patch up their friendship before it's too late. Too bad the deck is stacked against them.
attributes.description: X-Ray and Vav must stop the Mad King's plan, save Mogar, and patch up their friendship before it's too late. Too bad the deck is stacked against them.

attributes.title: X-Ray & Vav: Posi-Choices 101 - Short
attributes.caption: X-Ray and Vav are here to SCHOOL you in the art of positive life choices, AKA posi-choices. With the help of Mogar and friends, there's no lesson that can't be taught!
attributes.description: X-Ray and Vav are here to SCHOOL you in the art of positive life choices, AKA posi-choices. With the help of Mogar and friends, there's no lesson that can't be taught!

attributes.title: The X-Ray & Vav Holiday Special! - Short
attributes.caption: It's the holiday season, and X-Ray and Vav are getting set to throw the best party ever! But when X-Ray realizes he forgot to get Vav a gift, it's a last minute dash to find something for his best buddy.
attributes.description: It's the holiday season, and X-Ray and Vav are getting set to throw the best party ever! But when X-Ray realizes he forgot to get Vav a gift, it's a last minute dash to find something for his best buddy.
attributes.display_title: S2:E12 - The X-Ray & Vav Holiday Special! - Short
